description:
As lead trainer, I consider it my duty to inform you that there are reservations about Shevon's petition to the House. She is very green and her time training in the basement reveal a lack of fortitude, focus and commitment to the craft.
However, she is gorgeous, wonderfully naive, and she is a willing slave to sex. Can she get by on sex and charm alone or are the requirements of this job are greater than sucking cock and getting fucked?
title: Shevon's Arrival
